p: The THF-6 (given at the dose of 1,500 mg/day) consisted of six herbs: fruit of Streblus asper Lour, stems of Tinospora cordifolia (Willd.) Miers, corms of Cyperus rotundus, bark of Albizia procera (Roxb.) Benth, bark of Diospyros rhodocalyx Kurz, and fruit of Piper nigrum Linn [ 21]. The components and preparation of THF-6 are summarized in Table S1. The THF-6 capsules (250 mg/capsule) were manufactured by the Department of Pharmaceutical Sciences and Medicinal Plant Innovation Center, Faculty of Pharmacy, Chiang Mai University, in compliance with the Thai Pharmacopoeia standards and requirements. High-performance liquid chromatography and thin-layer chromatography were used for quality control of THF-6.
